name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Reloaded
description:
You are chosen to be a night guard in Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria, a famous family establishment worldwide. You must shoot off animatronics that have malfunctioned, and multiply. The more the clock nears 6AM, the quicker they multiply. Shoot them off, don't die, and experience a brand new "sit and survive" type of gameplay copied inspired by Those Nights at Rachel's 2: Reloaded by @Nikson_Official! :)

CREDITS

  • Programming - @Tozaku (with help from @Matusson too.)
  • Textures - @Matusson
  • Music - @Tozaku
  • Sound Effects (from https://freesound.org/ - You can find all of them here! https://docs.google.com/document/d/1shZktZS6PS_Ia7q5QWmiheHSo_966CwpsxXs5dyJJzY/edit?usp=sharing)
  • FNaF models from RynFox
  • Testers - @Matusson, @Tozaku, @Loloo and @FinalPathDevelopment.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  • AMD Ryzen 3 2200G or Equivalent
  • NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2GB or Equivalent
  • 4GB RAM

Runs over 60 frames on High!
